msbt.message: I love eating, but I'm a real bad cooker!
Just lookin' at the cooking book makes me so hungry! Sometimes I just lick the pages and imagine
One time? I accidentally burned water! A lotta folks don't know you can do that
When I do cook a thing—like when I make toast—it takes forever! I can't wait! I'm hungry now!
My grandma sent me a letter yesterday
She said she was thinking of me, and that I was still her special boy<10_4 /> "STILL"?! Could I be replaced?!
She sent me a buncha snacks too! I was supposed to save some, but I got excited and ate 'em all last night!
She sent it with some of her homemade . Grandmas are the best.
Wednesdays always make me miss that TV show I watched every week when I was little
" Party!" It was cool! They'd do a thing, and I'd yell, "Do it again!" I scared Grandpa every time!
" Station!" It was a kid's cooking show with NO adult supervision! The food was terrible, everything was sticky, and there were so many lawsuits! So many!
"Furniture for Hire" was about a couch who wanted to be a detective.<10_4 /> Hmm I mighta imagined that one
I like to mix it up and do different stuff on my walks every day.
Ya knowjust in case somebody's set a trap for me.
Gotta keep the bugs guessing! "Where's ?!" I could be anywhere!
Sometimes I pretend I'm a superhero, patrolling !I do a lotta heroic poses on those days.
Maybe I'll do a big clean so I can spend the weekend in a clean house.
A HUH HUH HUH! HUH HUH! HUH HUH HUH! HUH! HUH HUH HUH! Huh huhhahhhh Aw, who am I kiddin'?
A HUH HUH HUH! What would that even LOOK like? The bugs'd be so confused. A huh huh huh!
A HUH HUH, oh man, HUH HUH! I said it with a straight face! A HUH! "Clean" huh "house"! A HUH HUH!
I always do one last fun thing every night before bedtime. Maybe tonight
I'll play astronaut!I turn off all the lights and sit with a bucket on my head till I wake up on Planet Tomorrow!Grandpa taught me that game!
I'll play time traveler!I run in circles as long as I can, and then <10_5 />BOOM! I wake up on the floorand I've traveled to tomorrow!

I'll play lost-cave explorer! That's when I get under my bed and crawl around in the dark.I find lotsa treasures, like toysand snacks. I usually set up camp in there and play for a while. I come out of the cave when the sun comes up! <10_4 />Grandpa taught me that game.
It's Sunday! I always write about my week in my diary every Sunday.
I like to draw pictures of what snacks I ate, so I can remember to buy more later!
I guess I don't write, really. I scribble a bunch. And draw stuff. Sorta. Still fun, though!
Every Sunday, I always scribble the same thing! "Daisy Mae came this morning!" A surprise every time!
